title: Good report from bad men, no mean disparagement together with A cordial for Christians, when they receive evil, for well doing, being an arrow drawn forth of that sententious quiver, intituled, A Christian library, or, A pleasant and plentifull paradise of practical divinity.
author: Younge, Richard.
publisher: Printed by T.R. for James Crump,
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Richard Younge. cf. NUC pre-1956.
